      • addKeepAliveHeader

        public static void addKeepAliveHeader(org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpResponse nettyResponse)
        bran: http 1.1 defaults to keep-alive, but 1.0 has no spec about it. Some browsers will observe the Connection: Keep-Alive header.
        参数:
        nettyResponse -
